Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package prometheus-adapter for versions less than 0.12.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package prometheus-adapter for versions less than 0.12.0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package prometheus-adapter is earlier than 0.12.0-1, affected by CVE-2023-45288
